fullname: Prophet Muḥammad, peace and blessings be upon him

info: Father of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr and the first caliph in Islam
The second caliph in Islam
Brother of Ḥafṣah bint ʿUmar, another wife of the Prophet ﷺ

fullname: Jābir ibn ʿAbdullāh ibn ʿAmr ibn Thaʿlabah
searchname: Jabir ibn Abdullāh ibn Amr ibn Thalabah

info: Wife of the Prophet ﷺand daughter of ʿUmar, the second caliph
Daughter of the Prophet and step-daughter of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr
Sister of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr

fullname: Nasībah bint al-Ḥārith Um ʿAṭiyyah al-Anṣāriyyah
searchname: Nasibah bint al-Harith Um Atiyyah al-Ansariyyah
info: She helped Ḥafṣah bint ʿUmar wash the body of Zaynab, the daughter of the Prophet ﷺ
Nephew of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr
Wife of ʿAbdullāh ibn ʿAbdur-Raḥmān ibn Abi Bakr, who was the nephew of ʿĀʾishah bint Abi Bakr
Nephew of ʿĀʾishah bint Abi Bakr

Servant of Um Salamah and the mother of the famous scholar, Al-Hasan Al-Baṣri
